title: Photos taken on Pixel 2 not saving on phone
content:
Starting last night pictures taken on my Pixel 2 are not saved on the phone anymore. If I try to click the thumbnail image on the right after taking the picture it closes the camera app and opens the Google Photos app.

I already tried booting in safe mode, deleting cache for both camera app and Google Photos app, restoring camera app to original version, etc. Nothing works. 

Video is also broken - i can start recording but as soon as I press stop the Camera app crashes and I'm taken to the homescreen

The camera itself works, I managed to take a picture in Whatsapp  and send it in the app.

Any help much appreciated, as you can guess this is a huhe problem for me...
